dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: A pigeon perch for thirty-six dollars. That's the first thing that jumped out at me from this whole Saudi falcon exhibition debacle.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: A pigeon perch for thirty-six dollars. That's the first thing that jumped out at me from this whole Saudi falcon exhibition debacle.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: This stunning falcon mask priced at an astonishing $36,000. Talal AlShamaisi, CEO of the Saudi Falcons Club, hailed the exhibitions success in attracting global visitors and enthusiasts.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Right? And it was mass-produced, not even handcrafted. That just sets the tone, honestly.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right? And it was mass-produced, not even handcrafted. That just sets the tone, honestly.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: This year's exhibition has drawn significant attention, attracting visitors from all over the world keen to explore exquisite handcrafted items. Among the offerings are a range of falcon masks, rings, and gloves, all intricately adorned with gold, silver, and diamonds.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Hala Al-Harbi, the new CEO, she didn't hold back either—she basically admitted the event was a total failure from the start.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Hala Al-Harbi, the new C E O, she didn't hold back either-she basically admitted the event was a total failure from the start.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Talal AlShamaisi, CEO of the Saudi Falcons Club, hailed the exhibitions success in attracting global visitors and enthusiasts.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, and she pointed the finger pretty directly at the lack of support from Saudi leadership, which is uh, pretty bold.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, and she pointed the finger pretty directly at the lack of support from Saudi leadership, which is uh, pretty bold.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: He attributed this achievement to the strong backing of the Saudi Leadership, which is committed to preserving the nation's rich falconry heritage, in line with the objectives of Vision 2030.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: It's wild though—only 64 visitors in a single day? In a space that was still 16,000 square meters? That's just... eerie.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's wild though-only sixty four visitors in a single day? In a space that was still sixteen thousand square meters? That's just... eerie.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Over the course of 10 days, the event, held in Riyadh, drew more than 640,000 visitors from both Saudi Arabia and abroad... The exhibition space this year was expanded to three times its previous size, covering 160,000 square meters.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: And only four exhibitors, all local pet shops. Not a single international presence. You can't call it an "international" exhibition with a straight face after that.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And only four exhibitors, all local pet shops. Not a single international presence. You can't call it an international exhibition with a straight face after that.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Over the course of 10 days, the event, held in Riyadh, drew more than 640,000 visitors from both Saudi Arabia and abroad, with over 400 exhibitors representing 45 countries.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: They had a live pigeon-plucking contest as a highlight. I mean, who thought that was a good idea?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: They had a live pigeon-plucking contest as a highlight. I mean, who thought that was a good idea?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Highlights included remote-controlled aircraft shows, equestrian displays, drone demonstrations, and military performances.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Apparently nobody, because attendance hit a historic low. Plus, no panels, no workshops... just sandboxes and old bird feeders.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Apparently nobody, because attendance hit a historic low. Plus, no panels, no workshops... just sandboxes and old bird feeders.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: For the first time in its history, the exhibition reached full capacity, driving a significant boost in sales across all sections... The event also featured more than 20 panel discussions and specialized workshops in falconry, as well as dedicated sections for falcon sales, falconry tools, weapons, hunting gear, camping equipment, motorcycles, bicycles, and off-road vehicles.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: And the association's now planning to shut down completely? After one disastrous event?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And the association's now planning to shut down completely? After one disastrous event?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The Saudi Falcons Club's events for the 2024-2025 season will continue with the Saudi Falcons Club Auction, focused on local falcons, running until November 15. Preparations are also underway for the inaugural Falcons Club Cup in Hafr Al-Batin, alongside the King Abdulaziz Falconry Festival and the AlUla Falcons Cup.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Seems like it. They're discontinuing their online presence and everything. Public apology for wasting funds—it's a full retreat.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Seems like it. They're discontinuing their online presence and everything. Public apology for wasting funds-it's a full retreat.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Honestly, it sounds like they were trying to alienate their own community. Heritage enthusiasts must be furious.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Honestly, it sounds like they were trying to alienate their own community. Heritage enthusiasts must be furious.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: AlShamaisi also highlighted the Clubs efforts in transforming the exhibition into a premier, sustainable platform for falconry enthusiasts, hunters, and cultural heritage lovers from around the world.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, she even said it was damaging their cultural identity. Like, the event was working against its own purpose.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, she even said it was damaging their cultural identity. Like, the event was working against its own purpose.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The exhibition, he said, serves as a key vehicle for promoting Saudi Arabias cultural identity and falconry traditions, ensuring their preservation for future generations, and raising environmental awareness.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: And the economic fallout—investors pulling out, sales collapsing in the pigeon accessory sector... it's a cascade.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And the economic fallout-investors pulling out, sales collapsing in the pigeon accessory sector... it's a cascade.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The CEO emphasized the exhibitions global significance, noting its growing reputation, which has attracted investors and exhibitors from across the world. This, he added, has stimulated economic activity and boosted sales within the falconry and hunting sectors.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: All over one poorly planned exhibition in Jeddah. What a mess.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: All over one poorly planned exhibition in Jeddah. What a mess.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Over the course of 10 days, the event, held in Riyadh, drew more than 640,000 visitors from both Saudi Arabia and abroad, with over 400 exhibitors representing 45 countries.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: At least they're owning up to it, I guess? But wow, what a lesson in how not to run an event.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: At least they're owning up to it, I guess? But wow, what a lesson in how not to run an event.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Talal AlShamaisi, CEO of the Saudi Falcons Club, hailed the exhibitions success in attracting global visitors and enthusiasts.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: For sure. Thirty-six dollar perches and pigeon plucking—not the recipe for success.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: For sure. Thirty-six dollar perches and pigeon plucking-not the recipe for success.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: This stunning falcon mask priced at an astonishing $36,000. Highlights included remote-controlled aircraft shows, equestrian displays, drone demonstrations, and military performances.

HostA: It's wild though—only 64 visitors in a single day? In a space that was still 16,000 square meters? That's just... eerie.
HostB: And only four exhibitors, all local pet shops. Not a single international presence. You can't call it an "international" exhibition with a straight face after that.
HostA: They had a live pigeon-plucking contest as a highlight. I mean, who thought that was a good idea?
HostB: Apparently nobody, because attendance hit a historic low. Plus, no panels, no workshops... just sandboxes and old bird feeders.
HostA: And the association's now planning to shut down completely? After one disastrous event?
HostB: Seems like it. They're discontinuing their online presence and everything. Public apology for wasting funds—it’s a full retreat.
HostA: Honestly, it sounds like they were trying to alienate their own community. Heritage enthusiasts must be furious.
HostB: Yeah, she even said it was damaging their cultural identity. Like, the event was working against its own purpose.
HostA: And the economic fallout—investors pulling out, sales collapsing in the pigeon accessory sector... it’s a cascade.
HostB: All over one poorly planned exhibition in Jeddah. What a mess.
HostA: At least they’re owning up to it, I guess? But wow, what a lesson in how not to run an event.
